api.data package

Submodules

api.data.delete_data module

async api.data.delete_data.inventory_delete(name: str, amount: Union[int, str] = 1) → None[source]

Deletes a certain amount of an item from the db or deletes the whole thing :param name: The name of the item to delete :type name: str :param amount: The amount you want to delete or if you want to delete all set this to “all” :type amount: int or str

api.data.get_data module

async api.data.get_data.fetch_all() → Optional[List[asyncpg.Record]][source]

Fetches ALL items/record from the inventory table :returns: List[asyncpg.Record] or None

async api.data.get_data.fetch_item(name: str) → Optional[api.auth.classes.DataBaseItem][source]

Fetches a specific item from the inventory table :param name: The name of the item :type name: str

Returns

DataBaseItem or None

api.data.insert_data module

async api.data.insert_data.inventory_insert(item: api.auth.classes.Item, quantity: int = 1) → None[source]

Updates the quantity of an item in the database or creates a new item :param item: The item to add to / create :type item: Item :param quantity: The amount you want to add :type quantity: int

async api.data.insert_data.new_item(item: api.auth.classes.Item, quantity: int = 1) → None[source]

Updates the quantity of an item in the database or creates a new item :param item: The item to add to / create :type item: Item :param quantity: The amount you want to add :type quantity: int

api.data.table module

async api.data.table.create_inventory_table() → None[source]

Creates the Inventory table This will hold record of all the items

async api.data.table.delete_inventory_table() → None[source]

Deletes the inventory table

async api.data.table.reset_inventory_table() → None[source]

Resets inventory table (deletes it, then creates it)
